actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to make eligible for annuities payable under section 4 of Public Law 94-425 (relating to the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan) persons who became widows during the eighteen-month period following the effective date of such law.

summary.text: Makes persons who were widowed during the 18 month period following the effective date of the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan eligible for annuities under such program.

titles.title: A bill to make eligible for annuities payable under section 4 of Public Law 94-425 (relating to the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan) persons who became widows during the eighteen-month period following the effective date of such law.
